name: Tales of a Lost Mine
description:
Tales of a Lost Mine is a retro styled, inspired by old Game Boy graphics, Metroidvania.

Take control of an adventurer exploring the secrets of a long Lost Mine. Find new gear which will help you overcome obstacles and solve puzzles.

The game will be initially released for Android/iOs, but we will release it on computer too and we are already trying to port the game to desktop anlogside the mobile development. The builds provided here are Debug Builds and they serve us for testing and getting feedback from players. So keep in mind that there may be bugs and a lot of things still will be improved/changed.

The game controls are:

  • A / D - Move left or right
  • W - Jump
  • S - Falls through platforms
  • J - Use the contextual action
  • K - Use selected tools

The game UI has no keyboard support yet, so you will need to click the buttons to navigate through it.

Thanks for trying the debug demo and all feedback are very welcome.
